artistDescription.paragraph: After mingling with trolls, leprechauns and goblins for thousand of years in the deep jungles of Northern Goa comes a Gremlin. The sinister mutation of being technically oriented and very mischievous by origin brings about the adept engine 'Access Gremlin'.

Exhibiting many years of experience in subverting audio, The Access Gremlin formula incorporates new minatory patterns rooting from the forest, plagued by inverted fx and percussions layered with ominous basslines which is then drenched in state of the art acid.

This project consist two person Adam Szigeti & Gergo Bocsi. We were making music on separate ways, and in 2003 we met each other on the Internet. After realizing our common interests about psychedelic music, we felt its time to create our own ideas.

We try to make danceable psychedelic music, which has lots of powerful and hypnotic elements and also contains weird and trippy sounds, which can twist your brain at the dancefloor. We don't make all tracks in the same way, all sounds reflect an other state of our mind, we are always changing and our creations also are changing with us.

releases.cdName: VA Shadow Enuin: at the Earth's edge

artistDescription.paragraph: Among the many species inhabiting the ground and the underground of the psychedelic universe, you will find Adansonia. Born in 2007, he has lived and learned in caves, swamps and milenary forests, arising with his own peculiar caracter.
Nowadays, he has come back to his mother place in the valleys of Patagonia, from where he emits his hypnotic callings.
Akkma is the psytrance project of Maxime created in 2011.
After participating in many techno events he is very quickly attracted by psytrance. Enchanted by the magic of this music, he decides to experiment and compose his own tracks.

His compositions are a mixture of dark atmospheres, strange soundscapes and organic textures that allow him to get closer to his vision of psychedelic trance. Maxime likes to take inspiration from the atmospheres and sounds of nature. For him, music brings to a form of spirituality, allows to arouse emotions, to connect to nature and that's what he tries to share through his compositions.

Already Maged is Yehor Yudin, who was born on may the 8th 1983 in an artists' family. Sounds of electronic music touched him at the age of 15, during his school days as a shy raver from Lviv - Ukrainian provincial town. A little bit later under the strong impression of IDM, experimental and rave music, Gosha took his first steps towards musical creation at Fast Tracker 2.

Unforgettable acquaintance with psychedelic music happened at the end of april 1998 at a party organized by present good friends - Shiva Group and Trootootoo. Yehor opens up as Dj Ogg and begins to organize psytrance parties in his own town. In 2000 he enters architectural faculty and takes to trash and pagan-black metal music. At the same time Gosha plays at youth theatre, rehearsals often take place in Karpathian mountains due to the young experimental spirit of the stage-producer. Then with friends Yehor tries himself as a drummer in an unknown band. Finally, much affected by Yehor's love of fantasy fiction, the conception of Already Maged project is borne the same year. First track was released in 2006. Presently the project is developing more and more, admist preparation material for first album.
Yehor is also a producer of two side projects: experimental - 'Yum Tsgi' and 'Goa-Punk' influenced by suomi and australian sound. Until now both remain unreleased.

Shohei Matsuura by Day, Amorphous by Night. Young, but already well known musician from the land of the rising sun. Many years he please at Japanese psytrance fans with the first class music as dj. In 2005 Shohei has started to do own music based on internal influences.

His powerful tracks have entered into compilations from Phreex Networx, Parvati Records, Moon Koradji Records, Treetrolla Records. His sounds based on strong rhythmic and multilayered puzzles with touch of forest, but traditionally bring a powerful Japanese sound with a characteristic drive and a dynamical pressure. In our opinion it is one of the most perspective representatives of the Japanese scene.

....is a dynamic psytrance duo from Aarhus, Denmark. It started around 2003 and was first introduced to the scene in 2004. The project consists of Zoolog and Ringo Gringo aka Oginok, and has previously been released on Sanaton Records and Cosmic Theatre Records - the future has more in store.
'The Ninjas' has performed in many countries: Norway, Belgium, Germany, Poland, Switzerland, Ukraine, Greece, Russia and more - from festivals to smaller events.

The music is experimental, frame-breaking and with a sense of humor, yet it keeps within a mindset resembling the vibe of local forest-gatherings; pixie-pounding grooves, fractal simulations, combined with a pinch of madness - full dance-floor suitable.
Ascoil Sun started 2008 in Suvela, Espoo, Finland. The music is a mixture of progressive and psychedelic influences binded together with electronic systems. Behind the project are LV & Caja.
Ascoil suns music is a journey, every track is ment to be invidual 'trip' with constantly changing, strong emotional spheres.

Attoya is the project of two very tallanted bros Alex & Leonid Burshtein from Israel, Tel Aviv. The collective was born in 2003. Music of these guys are very atmospheric and multilayered, it gives high power of psychedelic vibes taken on other worlds, and transfer it to the dancefloors.
Attoya are always experimenting with music, they never same, and never sounds like someone else, they are unique representatives of the nature-organic psychedelic trance scene.

Baphomet Engine is a darkpsy project , who was born in goiânia in 2003, headed by two freaks (Fábio and Luis), who felt the need to transmit a new excitement to lovers of psy, causing the darker sides of the human race. Politics, religion, greed, vanity, lust and whatever else you may think about the poor dreams of the human race.

All this is part of the theme of Baphomet Engine a pioneer darkpsy project in the world, with presence in several festivals around the world as Japan, India, Australia, Costa Rica, Guatemala, Brazil, Portugal and Switzerland.

With songs in collections scattered around the world, and two albums, they pass their message of chaos and fun without fear of future nightmares. Today's Formation is based on Fabio a crazy for music since the burial of hell.

Battle of the Future Buddhas started making music around 1995. First releases came on BooM! Records, Superstring and Kavator Records. The first CD 'Twin Sharkfins' came out in 1998 and established the band as a underground force to be reckoned with. More releases followed on Schlabbaduerst, Chronicle of Mystery and Devils Mind Records.
And now Battle of the Future Buddhas became a part of Moon Koradji Records with their track on VA Intropix.
Captain Kirk from the near distant future has seen all nature being disintegrated. A decision was made to travel back in time to reverse the destructive process of the natural world.

He has chosen Finland's lakes and forests as his landing site where he will activate the secret plan to start a worldwide movement by spreading aboriginal Finnish shamans futuristic music. This will help to spread the message of the forest to modern day people and save the natural world from destruction.
Critter - psytrance producer and composer from Mexico City, provides psychedelic music with synthetic organic style.
Digitalian is one of the young producers from the land of rising sun.
He has been making music since 2006 with much influence by early time of Parvati sound such as Grapes Of Wrath, Digital Talk.

Got into psychedelic trance music in 1999, after a couple of years started to DJ and now ready for a live set. His music is telling trippy stories with sense of humor, filled of twisted sound, groovy rhythm and always full power!!!

Digitalist aka Thomas Franske was born in 1980 in Switzerland. Since 1999 he connected to psychedelic music and started DJing. In 2000 he made his first steps in music production and created sound with analog synthesizers!

In 2002 his project Digitalist was created with intention to perform powerful, futuristic and driving music. Over the past years he has been developing his sound and in currently working on his solo album.

Milan was born on march 1989 in Skopje, the capitol of Macedonia, now he is living in town called Kumanovo (same country). His whole life is guided by music, since his 10 he is playing the piano and havent stopped till now. At the age of 13 he played the bass guitar in punk/rock band. The need of something more powerfull brouth Milan into Psytrance.

After few years of intensive listening he started to create his own music. His music contains deep, mystic melodies and spacey ambient sounds. It cannot be defined as dark and agressive, because its made with love spreading the peacefull message all over the world.
Drone Bixie project, roasted and toasted by Christian Kaas Andersen, was started in the beginning of the millennium as oneman’s expression about what is defined as trance music.
The sound of Drone Bixie is the product of the mixture of electronic developed phat twisted resonating synthesis resulting in hypnotic rhythmic soulful dance music.
Also responsable of the Hokus Pokus productions, Christian is today focusing on his solo project writing atmospheric and groovy dance floor bombs for nighttime and dawn twilight.

Dennis aka Drury Nevil and Saffi Dafi was born in a cave near Andritsena village, close to the ancient greek temple of Apolonas (god of music and beauty) and that's why he decide to start writing psychedelic dance music with his computer and several hardware equipment.

Before he start composing these sounds, he never visited a psy parties or listen to this kind of music. He was just exploring the mountains and the forests around the village, where he grew up. Dennis is collecting many kinds of roots and flowers that he used to eat, etc.

Then he was listening this kind of strange new sounds in his first trance gathering experience. He realized, that many people around the world used to like these music, so is now ready to introduce his shelf as Drury Nevil to all of them.
Enjoy as he is enjoying... Boom!!!

releases.cdName: VA Shadow Enuin: at the Earth's edge

artistDescription.paragraph: [ E-Э / N-Н / I-И / CH-Ч / K-К / I-И / N-H ] guidance to the other side...

The first experiments with a sound in 1998-99. With 1999 for 2003 did music of absolutely different directions and moods... From Hardcore gabbba up to Drum'n'bass, Dub and Ambient... During too time there was a hobby for development goa trance, as a result has entered in psychedelic trance... Project Fearkiller has arisen in the beginning of 2005 year, after closing previous project Quazifreak. The new project has distinguished more rigid and fast, night sounding.
'I try to bring a maximum of philosophy, power and mysticism of a wood in which I often scoop energy for the future compositions in each track.'

For two decades Ghreg On Earth (Echo Vortex) has woven a unique musical vision as DJ, A&R manager and Producer. His dedication and passion for an intelligent, gritty and moody musical journey, has forged a sound that is known for it's pulsating cinematic spaces and rapid-fire organic grooves. Meshing, Blurring and Slurring wildly diverse stylistic elements into a dance-floor alchemy that is at once unpredictable and infectious, his sound has become synonymous with adventure in the peak of electronic music apotheosis.

To date, his unique sound has taken the world by storm; showcasing his deep and driving sound to massive crowds at events and festivals spanning the globe, including Ypy Poty (Brazil), Symbiosis (USA), & Boom Festival (Portugal), and headlining events all over Russia, Europe, Japan, South America, Mexico, & the US.

Ghreg On Earth currently resides in San Francisco, California (Earth) where he continues to create electronic music without boundaries. taking the next steps into futuristic mythologies that conjure the sonic imagination of tomorrow.

Gidra is Thomas Aquino Lobo's solo psytrance project which was started in 2003. Originally from Goa, Thomas has always been surrounded by a wide selection of musical styles and has himself played guitar since a young age.

After attending his first psytrance parties in the late 90's he found a whole new culture and it was then he decided that he had found the music he wanted to create. He started experimenting with software and it flowed from there onwards. He now focuses on writing night-time darkpsy music with strong freaky rhythms and demented loops rooting from the dark forests of Goa.

releases.cdName: VA Shadow Enuin: at the Earth's edge

artistDescription.paragraph: GnOhm is the solo project of electronic music producer Kalle.

Ever since picking up the guitar at the age of 5 his life have been focused on music. His inspiration comes from many different places nature, music, pictures etc. Some people describe his sound as hypnotic and groovey, but decide for yourself ;)
Outside of the trance project he also do downtempo/ambient Both Solo and as a part of the duo Lauge & Baba Gnohm.
Ingraval is a dark psy trance and hi-tech project from the mind of Nikita Tselovalnikov aka Penta.

Inzect is the solo project for Malmö-based producer Jonas Löven. By inspiration from both forest-, minimalism-, progressive and psytrance, Inzect achieves an unique blend of intricate grooves, mixed with psychedelic sound design, defined by beautiful progressive structures.
His outstanding style is very innovative and at the same time very danceable.

Ka-Sol is a Project of Christer Lundstrom. Grown up in a very small middle class community in Sweden called Bjorklinge, that is close to Uppsala. Bjorklinge is a very boring place and music was early his big interest in life. He got his first set of drums when he was 12 years old and he and and his friends was beginning to start metal and punk bands to the left and right.

In the late 80s he first herd a new kind of music called Acid House from a DJ friend of mine. He had a hard time to admit to his friend that he thought that it sounded pretty cool. He got a couple of tapes with music from his Friend and that that music grew in his head. That was Christers first meeting with modern dance music.

But the first techno music that he really bought was the Prodigy experience cd, he liked those crazy beats so much that he decided to begin making techno music himself. So he got a 4 channel music program and begun to experiment with sounds. He quickly got bored with the prodigy Rave sound and discovered the Harthouse and the Acid sound instead. In 1995 he met up with Jens Kvisler, who was the lead singer in a punk band that Christer's little brother hung out with.

Christer, Jens, Cristopher (Zoon) and a couple of friends started a punk band together just for fun. Jens was the one who introduced Christer to the goa trance sound/culture. Christer begun to buy synthesizers and started to make music under the name of A.H.S, then Jens also got interested in making electronical music so they started up the Ka-Sol project together, Shortly Mikael Svennson who was (is) a good friend joined up with them to.

They had wild twisted sessions in their studio resulting in tracks like Centbridge, Professor mephisto and Flying Carpet. In 1999 Jens and Mike got jobs in Gothenburg and the Ka-Sol project was put on ice. Christer made some tracks under the name of Laundstroom and was working with some sideprojects and colabirations at this time, 2001 Jens and Mike moved back to Uppsala and they had some sessions resulting in a couple of really nice tracks.
Since 2002 Christer Lundstrom is the only active member in Ka-Sol project.

Frank has been exploring the world of music since he was 7 years old. The story started when he was 6 and vigorously expressed to his father that he wanted a synthesizer. It would appear that Frank already had the sense of his musical language, but his father insisted that he had to learn the piano first. After few years he was clearly tired of piano lessons. This instrument simply did not give him enough musical stimulation nor possibilities he searched for. So in early adolescence he started playing with music software, experimenting with various genres till finally, in 2003, he found himself in psychedelic narration.

His sound has clear classical roots with a touch of national romanticism, wrapped in electronic form. Frank does not produce songs, rather he writes musical compositions. It is evident that his background as a painter and an artist have major influence on his musical expression, using fractals as an important foundation in both. He uses sound as if he was painting, creating colourful landscapes for attentive listeners to visualise and travel through, encompassing his inner states, emotions and visions.

A potent and at times aggressive, his expression invokes a powerful game between nerve endings, creating a cerebral meltdown. He tries to keep this invasive experience pleasant with his deep harmonious melodies and soft organic brush strokes. Introverted and unearthly he produces for the love of music, not fame. It is this approach that makes him unique.

Karash is born August 30th, 1979 in Nice (France). Very early, his father made him discover Rock music and Blues. Jimmy Hendrix, Led Zeppelin, The Beatles, Rolling Stones, Pink Floyd, were his first musical experiences.

Over the years, he developed interest in other music styles like Punk, Metal, Reggae, Experimental and also Classical. A special mention for Magma, a group that has been particularly influential for him. One day, one of his best friend (Noon alias Joan) made him listening to a track of Shiva Shandra...That was a real shock! 'It's possible to do that with synthetizers!!!' Year 2000 was the first contact with Goa music. He is completely captured by the vibes and the sounds.

He had found his way. In 2002, Karash began to produce sound just for the fun. In 2003 he joined the MTS(MantraTribeSystem) in order to organize parties around Geneva with the help of Padma (a well known DJ in the swiss French region) and also to have the opportunity to play live act under the name of MTS. When he first met Electrypnose at an after party, Karash was just killed by his sounds and his music style. This was the beginning of a true friendship that led to a joint produced album under the Cerebral Factory project.

Kerlivin is one of the pioneers of psy trance scene in Taiwan. He started to Dj in 1997 and in 2002 he begun to organize parties founding his own label and party organization '26D Production'. In 2005 he started to produce music...

After having been introduced to the world of sequencers and synthesisers in the Little Blue Men studio, Alex discovered his predilection for composing electronic music. Years later Alex co-founded Devils Mind Records, which specialises primarily in night-time psychedelic trance music by putting out compilations, albums and EPs in limited editions only, promoting artists from different corners of the world.

Apart from working with Devils Mind Records, Alex has also collaborated with other labels. One year's work was channelled into a compilation of Scandinavian forest music, Liberation Animale, which came out on the prominent Italian label Inpsyde Media in July 2009, making it the first psytrance compilation set to raise awareness for animal rights.

As goes for the Kiriyama sound of today, Alex's style has expanded since the start much thanks to his travels having performed in more than 20 countries ranging from Japan in the East to the American Pacific Coast in the West through which he has discovered new sources of inspiration. Thus, it's become increasingly more difficult to categorise his music as the style floats across different genres. Although it's common that people think of Kiriyama as a producer of nocturnal trance music, one could say that today Alex's sound pertains to the Scandinavian goa trance part of the psychedelic music spectrum.

Kirna is an electronic music solo project of Kir Ylle from Finland. Even as a teen Kir was always into composing his own music but initially had to borrow PC time from his pals to satisfy his urges. Finally, in the year 2001 he got his first long awaited computer. This allowed him to make tunes whenever he wanted and to spend as much time doing it as was needed. Many days and nights went in a haze of creating various weird and twisted compositions deriving inspiration from legendary electronic music veterans and pioneers like Aphex Twin.

Soon he was introduced to the infamous Finnish electronic dance music, which in spite of its experimental approach had a very beautiful melodic edge. He was struck by the fact, that dance music as well can indeed be very interesting . Of course, since then, this music was the main inspiration for Kirna.

Alf was found in the forest when he was 1 year old by two trolls. The rumour was that a strange kid was running around climbing the trees and it had to be stopped. Then suddenly many years later he discovered something they called goa trance. Wow, he thought, this is nice, yey. So after this and that he ended up trying to make these strange sounds come together in an even weirder way.

Together with his superhero friend Kim, he got into the whole label stuff to, and tryin to make some new things going on there as well. The mission is to not get too dark or light, as we all know the really nice colors lies between black and white.
Kuro Fusion is Sandro Podda, an appereance from the Netherlands. Born in the year or 1987 in Haarlem, a city that offers lots of lovely people and fine smokables!

The story started about 3/4 years ago when he met with psychedelics and magical parties, wich became an immense inspiration for him to guide the human mind trough a world of fairytales and obscure illusions...
Kuro Fusion creates deep psykadelik music in foreststyle and if you'll ask him kindly he won't hesitate to play some as well.

You can book him for the nighttime and he'll helps you to discover the balance of the universe and innerself in a groovy perfomance. Let the kickdrums be the footsteps and the basslines the vibration and its surroundings, welcome to this surrealistic environment. Enjoy!;-)

releases.cdName: VA Shadow Enuin: at the Earth's edge

artistDescription.paragraph: Renato Moreira was born in 1984 in Lisbon, Portugal. Starting his route in the electronic music field in 1998, he begun to gain a taste for computorized production in that same year using Rebirth 1.0.

Evolving in 2000 into the use of hosts like FL Studio, Cakewalk Sonar, Ableton Live and more recently to Cubase 5, he first had experiences in genres of electronic like breakbeat,downtempo and house, before turning to the more dark path of psychedelic trance in his selftitled project LAB, influenced by the upcoming wave of russian sounds.
LAB's music is based on fast passed and groove full beats, inducing futuristic ambiences and breaks, featuring powerful mental twisting leads!
In parallel, LAB is producing Downtempo, Breaks and Progressive with a project called Unikorp.

Loom was born on 13th February 1995. His love for music began in his childhood and in the early days. He had his first musical experience as a singer, drummer, and other instruments as well. During middle school, he started to study guitar and music theory at the ''Experience Music Academy'' near Padova, where he got his diploma in the summer of 2017.
In 2013/2014 Loom got in touch with the world of Trance music and after taking part in some parties, he fell in love with it, giving him the opportunity to develop as a person and soul.
He also teaches guitar in his studio and produces Psytrance with some funky/jazz/blues influences as part of the Slide project.

Carlos Lessa studied bassguitar and keyboards since the 15 years old, passing for any styles of music, from progressive-rock to heavy-metal, and had his first contact with eletronic music in 1998. It was 2000, when Carlos knew psy-trance, and since this momment he starts workin' experiences with this kind of music, resulting in he..s first project in this style as Magma Ohm (2002).

With dark atmosphere, aggressive basslines and synths, this project rises to 170 bpm. Thanks to this project, Carlos Lessa got positive results and recognitions as a producer, playing in festivals in Brazil, the Earthdance, Islandance, Waves of Peace, Quantika music festival , cachoeira alta dance festival 2008 , trancendance 2008 and others. Always with appraizal that they lead the public to a true sonorous experience. Today the project Magma Ohm had already detached fame in the scene of dark-psy-trance of Brazil and all over the world.
Mendrion is the psytrance project of Diego Garofo created in 2013.
His project can be described as deep and atmospheric psychedelic music. The inspiration come from the people, places, atmospheres and nature.
Nelson Jara Dos Santos is the name behind Mind Distortion System. A longtime member of the trance community, he was introduced to trance at a Portuguese Goa Gil party in 1994.
Start as DJ first in 1996, Nelson still loves to mix!
These days, his focus is split between family (happy father of Solaris), making music (yeah!), performing live and dj, analogue mastering and managing the label Lycantrop Records with he's wife.

Underground performer from Russia, blowing up the brain with non-standard approaches in detail, combination and purity of sounds, as well as the story that unfolds in his work. A lot of special effects, samples and synths peculiar only to him make his work unique and stunning.
In life he is quiet and calm, but not in his works. There is a lot to hear, the data flow just blows away.
Aiming to enter every musical project with a fresh mindset without constraining myself with too much predefined rules and guidelines.

Leaving the fail-safe environment and letting imagination flow continuous through the circuit towards new ways to express my musical ideas. A quest to explore rhythm, dynamics and the sonic qualities of timbre and texture.

With love for sonic manipulation I split sounds into atoms and carefully assemble the parts into new complex phenomenon and artificial soundscapes.Always seeking creative adventures and to push boundaries!

I am a psychedelic trance dj/producer living in Berkeley, California. I have been a DJ since 2000 and my styles have varied during the course of the past few years... I mainly spin Psychedelic Trance and occasionally Drum & Bass/ Jungle. In August of 2003, I began producing my own Psychedelic Trance and really enjoy writing my own music.

I was a violist for 10 years in my adolescence and have been a fan of all types of music, instrumental and non... I am a big fan of all types of psychedelic music, as well as funk, jazz, rock, and heavy metal.... I have found that in electronic dance music, a lot of the structure is similar to classical music. I also have been researching a lot of classical music to use as structural inspiration for my own pieces... My Debut album Cats @ Play has been released on Trishula Records in March 2006, and now I am beginning conceptual ideas for the next Mubali album as well as starting a new abstract electronica project, Xabuumuphu.

releases.cdName: VA Shadow Enuin: at the Earth's edge

artistDescription.paragraph: Noise Gust is Kagetoshi Nakamura psytrance producer from Japan. He has started making his own music since 2001.

This project is based on the combination of dark industrial sounds mixed with a very energetic bass and kick for dancing. His energy is dedicated to promote the Japanese scene through the production and promotion of psychedelic trance music.

That made incredible music creates profound stories where different energies from many horizons units to create a real and unique vibration to feel the space that extends in the sound are taking advantage of experience obtained from this scene.
Kagetoshi have any other projects or unit name of Quixotics and Mongust are active work too.

On the westcoast of Norway, between majestic mountains and in the far mystic forests somewhere…the NoizeBug project came alive. The project was founded by Steffen Sommerstad in 2003. After he fell in love with the psychedelic trance scene in the year 2000 and going to several parties and festivals across Scandinavia and Europe the following years, and finding his spiritual “self”, he wanted to set his own soundscapes to life.

When he first got the famous “WOW!” factor listening to twisted , powerful quality music on the dancefloor, he thought to himself: “I want to influence people exactly the same way and to get the same feeling like I did”.

He soon found himself floating away in front of the computer with different hardware synthesizers and software, creating lots of different sound patterns and rhythms, where rhythm has been a big interest all his life. His style is very powerful, with big organic atmospheres and mystic soundscapes, influenced by the mystic nature you’ll find in the magical land of Norway!
Nolm was born and bred in a traditional and working-class district in Tokyo, Japan. Surrounded by matsuri (festival) culture, he has learned Japanese folk music since he was 3 years old.

After encountering psytrance in 2002, he has become a DJ and discovered forest sound on VA / Boldly Audio, released by Sanaton Records in 2005. In the following year, he joined Savage Family artist group, which led by Savage Scream and started producing his own sound. Then he moved to Kansai area in south Japan, organised psytrance parties, Mystlake with likeminded people in 2007, and invited forest psytrance artists such as Procs and Hutti Heita. In 2008, he released some of his first tracks from Phreex Networx and a track called, “Mystlake” from Sanaton Records.
At the same time, he founded his own label, Mental Sauce and has been releasing compilations consisting of Japanese underground sound with the essence of North European forest sound.

oCeLoT makes music and travels Planet Earth playing it at parties and festivals. Aaron came from a musical family and plays lots of instruments. As a child he wanted to be an orchestra conductor when he grew up. The San Francisco psy scene of the 90's greatly influenced him as did the culture of psychedelics in general. Once 'turned on' at age 18 there was no going back. The culture of psy trance provided a home for this bit of star matter we call oCeLoT.

Aaron has produced electronic music since 1993. The oCeLoT project began in the year 2000 and has been heard rocking dancefloors in over 50 countries on festivals and parties worldwide. A discography of 8 albums and over 150 singles ranges from chillout and ambient music through all stages of trance from daytime and morning sounds until the deepest night.

oCeLoT music is characterized by a driving energy, a rich range of sounds, intelligent progressions, and a constant evolution in themes. Never boring, often iconoclastic, it pushes you into a higher state of consciousness.
Odr is Harald Nielsen, born in Amsterdam, The Netherlands.

From 'Odr', which is synonymous with mad, frantic, mind and poetry in Old Norse, you can expect a audible message which can be described as a weird bobbling puddle of mystery, hidden beneath a dark eerie shroud cast by luscious not-of-this-world plants, growing in the ruins of a desolated pharmaceutical factory, settled deep in the jungle of a idyllic, far away paradise.
OIL is Stefan Anderson from the deep fried forests of Ludvika, Sweden. Stefan likes to experiment and combine influences of different music styles in his production.

Since 2007 his musical direction was turning more and more into a straight psycho-forest project with an open mind to all kinds of underground genres. Its hard categorise his style. But, supposedly, u could call it psychedelic and funky, leaning against a dark mood. He likes to juggle around with a thick range of elements of the track, over a wide spectrum of frequencies and panorama, in all 4 dimensions of sound. OIL will bash and wiggle on your third eye with a bassline that is mossy, sticky and dripping.

OIL feels happy to be part of the lively and often nutty swedish nightmusic scene where he feels very comfortable and which inspired him a lot. He digs sounds that makes you think of scratching, beat-juggling and other turntable-tricks. His own BPM ranges from 149-165.

Born in the southwest of Germany, Freiburg in 1980. His first contact with electronic music was with the Cybertribe where he went to techno parties at the time. From there on he went through several music styles from acid house to psytrance and also ambient music with the same spirit. In 1995 he installed Cubase and Rebirth on a 4400Mac than bought a MPC2000 and started producing his own style of music, later on he purchased a Korg Z1.

Now he is producing his music with the use of a PowerMac and Logic 8 His musical spectrum for producing ranges from Goatrance (more melodic) to psytrance (more noisy) and Ambient music. He uses many instruments in a tracks like weaving a tapestry out of different fades. You could call it multi layered music, but u can say nothing at all because he have songs in near all known Konzepts. Sounds not so clean and digital than the most Producktions of today, but rich deep Atmosphere - more organic than mechanic. So his Liveact is ever Multistyle and/or fitted to the different Floors.
Oliver, a German producer, has been a pioneer in the psytrance scene for over two decades. Born in Freiburg, in 1980, he began experimenting with electronic music production in 1995.
Oliwave’s musical style is diverse, ranging from ambient music to fast-paced psychedelic goa trance. The project represents melodic rhythms with a positive, energetic and open-minded mood.

Moon Koradji Records, a label renowned for its avant-garde approach to electronic music, proudly released Oliwave’s debut album “Alive Memory” in 2023, a work that speaks to the very essence of the human experience, evoking feelings of hope, joy, and optimism.
In addition to the Oliwave project, Oliver has also explored the dark side of psytrance through his side project, Olien, but that’s another story :)

Pandora's Box is Valentin Rusiechi and Luciano Losiggio. Both had their first music experience playing the guitar in a couple hc-punk and reggae/ska bands. But in the 2004 they had their first psychedelic experience. Since then, everything changed.

The world was not the same for them anymore and music started to become their primary key to the other side. They started making their own music, to experiment with sound, to make the world change according to those strange waveforms and finally, they became magicians of the sound, ready to free their sorceries to the universe.
Valentin & Luciano are also working in a new proyect with Will O' Wisp (Life From The Loam) and also with Abyss Ooze with Filter from Megalopsy.

Pandora's Box is a project that tries to combine futuristic alien technology with the primitive human mind, creating a new dimension where the alien beings and the human race trades information and play together.

releases.cdName: VA Shadow Enuin: at the Earth's edge

artistDescription.paragraph: Darko is from Macedonia, was born in 1981 in the capital city Skopje. First time he heard about trance music on his 15 years and on 20 years when he meet Valentino (Blisargon Demogorgon), he deicide to producing his own music.
He make Deep Triping Atmosphere music with fast bass line.

releases.cdName: VA Shadow Enuin: at the Earth's edge

artistDescription.paragraph: Purosurpo is Jens Erikkson from Sweden. For a lot of people better knows as 1/2 of Derango. His creativity is a full expression of the psychedelic experience transferred in music. The huge sound pictures are created combining a solid-warm base with on the top waves of sounds from synths and samples in a constant change and movement: the result is an unique wrapping effect that gives to the listeners on one side the safe feeling of the belonging to mother-earth womb and, on the other side, the challenge of discovering and understanding that our mind and spirit have no borders. His music is like a visual, and the expierenced listener will be carried away !

Daniil, the body-mind mechanism behind Saikozaurus project, was born in Odessa, Ukraine in 1980. He discovered psytrance music again back in 1998 and then it was only a matter of time before he started to DJ in 2001. Later in 2003 first computer was purchased and Saikozaurus project was born. In 2007 Saikozaurus came up on psytrance scene with his first release on the v/a Neverending Story by Zaikadelic Rec. In 2012  Saikozaurus released his first solo EP “Demiurgent Agent” on Moon Station Rec. Also his tracks were released at different labels, such as Vantara Vichitra, Insomnia, Mighty Quinn, Treetrolla, Zaikadelic and Skygravity and some more. In 2018 Saikozaurus joined Moon Koradji Records.
Also you can find his tracks under name Tursiopsis and Face of Space (in collaboration with Shivattva).

Saikozaurus has his own unique style, where you can discover a fresh blend of chaos and order, dark and light and space. This mystic journey deep inside subconscious drags you along to the perception of holistic dimension of pure Absolute consciousness and ancient  human archetypes as well as channelling with friendly beings around the Universe.
ॐ  May all beings be happy and free!
Savage Scream is the solo project of Mizuki Nishihata, a renowned veteran of Japan's psytrance scene.

Known for his captivating music, Mizuki has also gained recognition through various solo side projects, including Psyfix and Scaltinof, as well as successful collaborations like Baal, Bug Funk, Savajun, Yasagure Pan Nakotta, and Kukunochi.
Mizuki Nishihata's boundless creativity continues to push the boundaries of electronic music, captivating audiences with his eclectic ventures.

The project was initiated in 2013 by the Japanese artist with the real name Shunsuke Shiiba. It was inevitable for him to encounter psychedelic music, as he had been collecting and experimenting with various forms of music until then.

Psytrance proved to be the most suitable direction for him to express the essence of sound. Every day Shunsuke continues to experiment in an effort to convey the wonders of the universe through sonic vibrations.

David (Leptit/Shotu) discovered electronic music in 1996 at free parties in France, he integrated fully into trance 2 years later in Ibiza and get finally into DJing in 2002. A year later, he met the Hadra 'tribe', and here he soon found his place. He participates actively and with a shared happiness to its growing success. He has played in UK, Hungary, Belgium, Northern Ireland, Chec Republic, Portugal, Italy, Denmark, Brasil, and Morocco at parties and festivals such as UNIVERSO PARALELLO 2005 or BOOM FESTIVAL 2006 !

Staying in a 'night psychedelic' style, Leptit's musical project called 'Shotu'. After good collaborations with such artists as Jahbo, Grapes of wrath or Barak, he compiled his first compilation 'TWISTED VISION' during the summer 2006. Also released a few tracks on compilations from Hadra, Peak and Vertigo records, and his debut Album on March 2007 on Hadra records !!! Join him fearless for a fantastic expedition in the worrying depths of the SHOTU jungle...

releases.cdName: VA Shadow Enuin: at the Earth's edge

artistDescription.paragraph: Silent Horror is a home made dark psy producer based in India, Pune. Been listening to psytrance for 6 years now and been following all the the changes in the psychedelic scene. Majorly influenced by horror movies and gothic black metal he started his own journey 2003 and now is one of the finest underground night time psy producers.

Jigar is a Marine Engineer by profession and has managed to dedicate most of his time to make music for people to freak out on. He will always be thankful to Claw and Paranoize for giving his sound the magic touch!

If acidic lines, twisted melodies and even touching scary and hypnotics realms is what you like; or simply if you like hard, abnormal music in the night with a strong presence on the kick and with fat bass lines then Just turn ON, tune IN and drop some SILENT HORROR!!

Emotion, Soul, Serenity, harnessing the power of peace within the bandwidths of darkness & light. With hopes to re-discover ancient ways of conduction & care for spirit to release. Guiding lines of divine essence merging with static electricity_-*
Psychedelic trance artist from Nantes, based in Arâches, Rhone-Alpes, France.

releases.cdName: VA Shadow Enuin: at the Earth's edge

artistDescription.paragraph: My name is Geir Kristian from Norway, born in 1983, and I make psy music for the project Taakelur. Always liked deep music with mystic atmospheres, so thats what i try to create!

Tersius, electronic music producer from South Africa, whose story of a passion for the transcendental dance floor began with childhood experimentation with cheap electronic equipment and a cryptic mix of stylistic influences from any dance beat he could discover through his fellow 12-year old contacts coupled with an extensive psych rock collection inherited from the parentals.

At 16, he popped his mental cherry at his first psychedelic gathering at Vortex close to Cape Town. Soon, he moved to the UK and started with Cubase lessons along with sonic experimentations with computers and a Korg MS-20, occasionally complimented with participation in sacred plant journeys. Influenced by a full spectrum of underground forest and Goa music at the time, he was furthermore fortunate to be a part of a musical melting pot of fellow producers in the area. Currently he is back in Eden home South Africa, where he is working on forest music and deep progressive music under the moniker Kabi.

His soundscapes are independent of the varied approaches and styles. However, a constant feature of his sonic nuances include the experience of multiple organic textures and groovy basslines, leading to graceful suggestions towards a common anceStar.
Alien Shemale Ghost Music :)
The one man psychedelic trance project 'Traskel' was founded by Marcus Ryman in Orebro, Sweden sometime during a strange moment in 2002.
With 3000 astral years behind him he has fled the big city madness and are now traveling around our galaxy to find his own planet.

Music has always been a big part of his life. With his bass and farfisa organ he has played a lot of different tunes and he has worked his way through many genres and constellations. In his music you will notice the hard and twisted basses,the glowing tunes and the spirit of life and love.
The visiual and musical influences made him become what he is today. The sound of Traskel is what you will hear when the elves and trolls are awake and dance in the moist meadow.

Troglodytes is David Hall & Fadi Acar. Both of them produce a uniquely dark forest style from their cave studio in Eskilstuna, 80km away from Psy-mecca Orebro. Both of them were born in Sweden. Being brought up in a musical family, Dave went to learn 'Estethic music' for 3 years in College. He took a gap of some years and then did one year with a Folkschool learning to record music digitally through computers besides the theory including mic-placement, anatomy of the ear, analog vs digital, acoustics etc..

Dave's first music influences were the 60-70s rock and 80 rock/hardrock in the house, later when he started getting his own impression of things, he tuned to rap/hip-hop in 1st grade school. He also began to Dj in School parties mainly playing dance music for a few years and also did some hip-hop music with cubasis.
In the year 95-96 Dave discovered what he considers real dance music - Goa Trance and immediately fell in love the first time he heard it.

Fadi has been influenced by his older brother and sister who brought him all kind of music. From hardrock to their folk music, assyrian traditional. In early age he started listening to hiphop, trance, goa from the early 90s.
Nowadays he listens to psy and gangstarap from Memphis USA, dirty south... Not the MTV commers though. Also reggae like Black Uhuru, Alpha Blondy, Israel Vibration and Steel Pulse.
Trold's musical style fits when the light goes away, or when night meets the day...

Tromo (the Greek word for fear) aka John Stilianides was born in N. Ionia, a suburb of Athens. Although he first started studying classic guitar and synthesizer at very young age, few years later he was playing with friends in heavy and black metal style. At about 1997 he initiated in electronic music and then he has been to many parties that affected his musical choices. The most important was at an international festival in a mysterious island of Greece called Samothraki where he was completely 'psychedelized'.
In 2004 he began to set up his studio in order to compose his dark psychedelic thoughts and turn them into tracks that can be heard all over the psycho-world.

releases.cdName: VA Shadow Enuin: at the Earth's edge

artistDescription.paragraph: Uttu is a brazilian psychedelic project created in 2013 by Thiago Del Torto and Kleber Colombini. They've met each other while studying music production in a college in Sao Paulo. Both have been in touch with music for a long time and together were able to understand the connection that embrace ourselves in the universe.

This bound has brought all needed to the development of the project where the no string music takes place as a huge timeless trip inside mind, through dense atmosphere, different rhythms and weird sounds, expressing all the universe gave us, always bringing the analog sounds close to the nature, reaching the deepest of forest.

Conceived and delivered in Riffa. Now residing on the moist nether-flats of Haarlem. Grew up in a nest of classical and jazzy notes... but those harmonic melodies made way for satanic riff's 'n grunts in death-metal. Later absorbed by the magic, power and mystery of psychedelic conjurations. He started experimenting on electronics a couple of years ago as udderrkropunsy.

In Whrikk's compositions some things are not what they seem. Multiple strange beings reside within the bass for warmth. Large and viscious signals muffled by green smoke, have been heard from the peaks of the many riffs and rhythms, which makes their way through weird time & space durin' track length. Listen carefully..

releases.cdName: VA Shadow Enuin: at the Earth's edge

artistDescription.paragraph: Ziul Oiram the project was born from the mind of Brazilian music producer and multi-instrumentalist Luiz Mário aka Cuca. A musician since childhood who develops his talent in various areas of art, he is the founder of the label Om Shanti Records.

With more than 10 years of experience as a DJ and music producer, his project is going through a new phase. Its sound features a more atmospheric and deep forest line, charged basslines, and digital leads.
